body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#17900](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17900.html) (ci: Combine 32-bit build with CentOS 7 build by theStack)
* [#17894](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17894.html) (tests: Avoid accumulating allocated memory in a global state if LogPrintf is called when fuzzing by practicalswift)
* [#17891](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17891.html) (scripted-diff: Replace CCriticalSection with RecursiveMutex by MarcoFalke)
* [#17822](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17822.html) (refactor: Use uint16_t instead of unsigned short by ahook)
* [#17786](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17786.html) (refactor: Nuke policy/fees->mempool circular dependencies by hebasto)
* [#17783](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17783.html) (util: Fix -norpcwhitelist, -norpcallowip, and similar corner case behavior by ryanofsky)
* [#17737](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17737.html) (Add ChainstateManager, remove BlockManager global by jamesob)
* [#17581](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17581.html) (refactor: Remove settings merge reverse precedence code by ryanofsky)
* [#17580](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17580.html) (refactor: Add ALLOW_LIST flags and enforce usage in CheckArgFlags by ryanofsky)
* [#17577](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17577.html) (refactor: deduplicate the message sign/verify code by vasild)
* [#17526](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17526.html) (Use Single Random Draw In addition to knapsack as coin selection fallback by achow101)
* [#17493](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17493.html) (util: Forbid ambiguous multiple assignments in config file by ryanofsky)
* [#17482](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17482.html) (util: Disallow network-qualified command line options by ryanofsky)
* [#17458](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17458.html) (Refactor OutputGroup effective value calculations and filtering to occur within the struct by achow101)
* [#17443](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17443.html) (Drop checkFinalTx and use Median Time Past to check finality of wallet transactions by ariard)
* [#17398](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17398.html) (build: Update leveldb to 1.22+ by laanwj)
* [#17331](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17331.html) (Use effective values throughout coin selection by achow101)
* [#17268](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17268.html) (Epoch Mempool by JeremyRubin)
* [#17261](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17261.html) (Make ScriptPubKeyMan an actual interface and the wallet to have multiple by achow101)
* [#17037](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17037.html) (Testschains: Many regtests with different genesis and default datadir by jtimon)
* [#16698](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16698.html) (Mempool: rework rebroadcast logic to improve privacy by amitiuttarwar)
* [#16673](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16673.html) (Relog configuration args on debug.log rotation by LarryRuane)
* [#16545](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16545.html) (refactor: Implement missing error checking for ArgsManager flags by ryanofsky)
* [#16528](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16528.html) ([WIP] Native Descriptor Wallets (take 2) by achow101)
* [#16490](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16490.html) (rpc: Report reason for replaceable txpool transactions by MarcoFalke)
* [#16463](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16463.html) ([BIP 174] Implement serialization support for GLOBAL_XPUB field. by achow101)
* [#16411](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16411.html) (BIP-325: Signet support by kallewoof)
* [#16377](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16377.html) ([rpc] don't automatically append inputs in walletcreatefundedpsbt & fundrawtransaction by Sjors)
* [#16115](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16115.html) (On bitcoind startup, write config args to debug.log by LarryRuane)
* [#15606](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/15606.html) ([experimental] UTXO snapshots by jamesob)
* [#15590](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/15590.html) (Descriptor: add GetAddressType() and IsSegWit() by Sjors)
* [#12134](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/12134.html) (Build previous releases and run functional tests by Sjors)
* [#10102](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/10102.html) ([experimental] Multiprocess bitcoin by ryanofsky)
* [#9381](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/9381.html) (Remove CWalletTx merging logic from AddToWallet by ryanofsky)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
